verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Aijeleth hash-Shahar. A Psalm of David. My God <WH410>, my God <WH410>, why hast thou forsaken <WH5800> me <WH7350>? Why art thou so far from helping <WH3444> me <WH1697>, and from the words of my groaning <WH7581>?
O my God <WH430>, I cry <WH7121> in the daytime <WH3119>, but thou answerest <WH6030> not <WH3915>; And in the night season, and am not silent <WH1747>.
But thou art holy <WH6918>, O thou that inhabitest <WH3427> the praises <WH8416> of Israel <WH3478>.
Our fathers <WH1> trusted <WH982> in thee <WH982>: They trusted, and thou didst deliver them <WH6403>.
They cried <WH2199> unto thee <WH4422>, and were delivered: They trusted <WH982> in thee <WH954>, and were not put to shame.
But I am a worm <WH8438>, and no man <WH376>; A reproach <WH2781> of men <WH120>, and despised <WH959> of the people <WH5971>.
All they that see <WH7200> me laugh me to scorn <WH3932>: They shoot out <WH6358> the lip <WH8193>, they shake <WH5128> the head <WH7218>, saying,
Commit <WH1556> thyself unto Jehovah <WH3068>; Let him deliver <WH6403> him <WH6403>: Let him rescue him <WH2654>, seeing he delighteth in him.
But thou art he that took <WH1518> me out of the womb <WH990>; Thou didst make me trust <WH982> when I was upon my mother <WH517>'s breasts <WH7699>.
I was cast <WH7993> upon thee from the womb <WH7358>; Thou art my God <WH410> since my mother <WH517> bare me <WH990>.
Be not far <WH7368> from me <WH6869>; For trouble is near <WH7138>; For there is none to help <WH5826>.
Many <WH7227> bulls <WH6499> have compassed <WH5437> me <WH47>; Strong bulls of Bashan <WH1316> have beset me round <WH3803>.
They gape <WH6475> upon me with their mouth <WH6310>, As a ravening <WH2963> and a roaring <WH7580> lion <WH738>.
I am poured out <WH8210> like water <WH4325>, And all my bones <WH6106> are out of joint <WH6504>: My heart <WH3820> is like wax <WH1749>; It is melted <WH4549> within <WH8432> me <WH4578>.

My strength <WH3581> is dried up <WH3001> like a potsherd <WH2789>; And my tongue <WH3956> cleaveth <WH1692> to my jaws <WH4455>; And thou hast brought <WH8239> me into the dust <WH6083> of death <WH4194>.
For dogs <WH3611> have compassed <WH5437> me <WH5712>: A company of evil-doers <WH7489> have inclosed <WH5362> me <WH3738>; They pierced my hands <WH3027> and my feet <WH7272>.
I may count <WH5608> all my bones <WH6106>; They look <WH5027> and stare upon me <WH7200>.
They part <WH2505> my garments <WH899> among them <WH3830>, And upon my vesture do they cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>.
But be not thou far <WH7368> off <WH3068>, O Jehovah: O thou my succor <WH360>, haste <WH2363> thee to help me <WH5833>.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from the sword <WH2719>, My darling <WH3173> from the power <WH3027> of the dog <WH3611>.
Save <WH3467> me from the lion <WH738>'s mouth <WH6310>; Yea <WH7161>, from the horns of the wild-oxen <WH7214> thou hast answered me <WH6030>.
I will declare <WH5608> thy name <WH8034> unto my brethren <WH251>: In the midst <WH8432> of the assembly <WH6951> will I praise thee <WH1984>.

Ye that fear <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>, praise <WH1984> him <WH2233>; All ye the seed of Jacob <WH3290>, glorify <WH3513> him <WH1481>; And stand in awe of him <WH2233>, all ye the seed of Israel <WH3478>.

For he hath not despised <WH959> nor abhorred <WH8262> the affliction <WH6039> of the afflicted <WH6041>; Neither hath he hid <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from him <WH7768>; But when he cried unto him <WH8085>, he heard.
Of thee cometh my praise <WH8416> in the great <WH7227> assembly <WH6951>: I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> before them that fear him <WH3373>.
The meek <WH6035> shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied <WH7646>; They shall praise <WH1984> Jehovah <WH3068> that seek <WH1875> after him <WH3824>: Let your heart live <WH2421> for ever <WH5703>.

All the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> shall remember <WH2142> and turn <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; And all the kindreds <WH4940> of the nations <WH1471> shall worship <WH7812> before thee <WH6440>.
For the kingdom <WH4410> is Jehovah <WH3068>'s; And he is the ruler <WH4910> over the nations <WH1471>.

All the fat <WH1879> ones of the earth <WH776> shall eat <WH398> and worship <WH7812>: All they that go down <WH3381> to the dust <WH6083> shall bow <WH3766> before <WH6440> him <WH5315>, Even he that cannot keep his soul alive <WH2421>.
A seed <WH2233> shall serve <WH5647> him <WH5608>; It shall be told of the Lord <WH136> unto the next generation <WH1755>.
They shall come <WH935> and shall declare <WH5046> his righteousness <WH6666> Unto a people <WH5971> that shall be born <WH3205>, that he hath done it <WH6213>.
